page.title: 02THE SCHOOL COUNCIL
page.content: THE SCHOOL COUNCIL CONSISTS OF A BOY AND GIRL FROM EACH YEAR WHO TRY TO HELP GET NEW OBJECTS OR CLUBS FOR THE SCHOOL. THE HEADMASTR OF OUR SCHOOL IS THE LEADER OF THE SCHOOL COUNCIL.WE TALK ABOUT SCHOOL DISCOS, CONNECTION WITH OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD.THERE ARE REQUESTS FOR PEOPLE TO DO CERTAIN THINGS AND IF THEY HAVE PERMISSION. A SOCIAL CLUB HAS BEEN ARRANGED WITH THE SCHOOL COUNCIL. THE SCHOOL COUNCIL MEETS NEARLY EVERY THIRD MONDAY OF EACH MONTH. IT STARTS AT 12.45PM AND FINISHES AT 1.25PM.
